statements.select: IF #User_ID#='SuperAdmin' OR #User_Name#='SuperAdmin' BEGIN SELECT 'SuperAdmin' [User_ID] ,'SuperAdmin'[User_Name] ,NULL [User_Password] ,'SuperAdmin' [User_EMPNO] ,NULL [User_Sex] ,NULL [User_Address] ,NULL [User_PhoneNo] ,NULL [User_IsValid] ,NULL [User_CreatedBy] ,NULL [User_CreatedTime] ,NULL [User_UpdatedBy] ,NULL [User_UpdatedTime] ,NULL [User_VersionNo] ,NULL [User_TransID] END ELSE BEGIN SELECT DISTINCT T1.[User_ID] ,T1.[User_Name] ,T1.[User_Password] ,T1.[User_EMPNO] ,T1.[User_Sex] ,T1.[User_Address] ,T1.[User_PhoneNo] ,T1.[User_IsValid] ,T1.[User_CreatedBy] ,T1.[User_CreatedTime] ,T1.[User_UpdatedBy] ,T1.[User_UpdatedTime] ,T1.[User_VersionNo] ,T1.[User_TransID] FROM SM_User T1 INNER JOIN SM_UserOrg T2 ON T2.UO_User_ID=T1.User_ID T2.UO_Org_ID=#UO_Org_ID# WHERE T1.User_IsValid=1 T1.User_ID=#User_ID# T1.User_Name=#User_Name# T1.User_Password=#User_Password# T1.User_EMPNO=#User_EMPNO# END

IF #User_ID#='SuperAdmin' OR #User_Name#='SuperAdmin' BEGIN SELECT DISTINCT T3.[Org_ID] ,T3.[Org_ShortName] FROM SM_Organization T3 WHERE T3.Org_IsValid=1 END ELSE BEGIN SELECT DISTINCT T3.[Org_ID] ,T3.[Org_ShortName] FROM SM_UserOrg T1 INNER JOIN SM_User T2 ON T2.User_ID=T1.UO_User_ID T2.User_ID=#User_ID# T2.User_EMPNO=#User_EMPNO# INNER JOIN SM_Organization T3 ON T3.Org_ID=T1.UO_Org_ID AND T3.Org_IsValid=1 WHERE T1.UO_IsValid=1 END

IF #User_ID#='SuperAdmin' OR #User_Name#='SuperAdmin' BEGIN SELECT 1 'User_IsSuperAdmin', 'SuperAdmin' User_ID, 'SuperAdmin' User_Name, '' User_Password, 'SuperAdmin' User_EMPNO, T5.Org_ShortName 'User_PrintTitlePrefix', T5.Org_PlatformCode, T5.Org_ID, T5.Org_Code, T5.Org_FullName, T5.Org_ShortName, T5.Org_Prov_Code, T5.Org_Addr, T5.Org_TEL, T5.Org_PhoneNo, ISNULL(T7.Para_Value1,'Coeus') 'SM_SystemName', 'Coeus' SM_SystemCode FROM SM_Organization T5 LEFT JOIN SM_Parameter T7 ON T7.Para_Code1='0002' WHERE T5.Org_IsValid=1 T5.Org_ID=#UO_Org_ID# END ELSE BEGIN SELECT 0 'User_IsSuperAdmin', T1.User_ID, T1.User_Name, T1.User_Password, T1.User_EMPNO, ISNULL(T1.User_PrintTitlePrefix,T5.Org_ShortName) 'User_PrintTitlePrefix', T5.Org_PlatformCode, T5.Org_ID, T5.Org_Code, T5.Org_FullName, T5.Org_ShortName, T5.Org_Prov_Code, T5.Org_Addr, T5.Org_TEL, T5.Org_PhoneNo, ISNULL(T7.Para_Value1,'Coeus') 'SM_SystemName', 'Coeus' SM_SystemCode FROM SM_User T1 INNER JOIN SM_UserOrg T4 ON T4.UO_User_ID=T1.User_ID T4.UO_Org_ID=#UO_Org_ID# LEFT JOIN SM_Organization T5 ON T5.Org_ID=T4.UO_Org_ID LEFT JOIN SM_Parameter T7 ON T7.Para_Code1='0002' WHERE T1.User_IsValid=1 T1.User_ID=#User_ID# T1.User_Name=#User_Name# T1.User_EMPNO=#User_EMPNO# T1.User_Password=#User_Password# END

SELECT CUL_ID ,CUL_No ,CUL_Name ,CUL_ApplyReason ,CUL_ContactNo ,CUL_NetworkCardType1 ,CUL_MACAdress1 ,CUL_NetworkCardType2 ,CUL_MACAdress2 ,CUL_NetworkCardType3 ,CUL_MACAdress3 ,CUL_ApproveStatus ,CUL_InvalidDate ,CUL_IsValid ,CUL_Remark ,CUL_CreatedBy ,CUL_CreatedTime ,CUL_UpdatedBy ,CUL_UpdatedTime ,CUL_VersionNo ,CUL_TransID FROM SM_ClientUseLicense WHERE CUL_IsValid=1
AND ( CUL_MACAdress1 = #CUL_MACAdress1# OR CUL_MACAdress2 = #CUL_MACAdress1# OR CUL_MACAdress3 = #CUL_MACAdress1# OR CUL_MACAdress2 = #CUL_MACAdress1# OR CUL_MACAdress2 = #CUL_MACAdress2# OR CUL_MACAdress2 = #CUL_MACAdress3# OR CUL_MACAdress3 = #CUL_MACAdress1# OR CUL_MACAdress3 = #CUL_MACAdress2# OR CUL_MACAdress3 = #CUL_MACAdress3# ) ORDER BY CUL_CreatedTime DESC
